target.description: Calculate the arcsin of a given value and return the result in radians and degrees.
target.name: calculate_arcsin

target.code:
from sympy import Rational

def calculate_tan_difference(tan_alpha, tan_beta):
    numerator = tan_alpha - tan_beta
    denominator = 1 + (tan_alpha * tan_beta)
    result = Rational(numerator, denominator)
    return result
target.description: Calculate the tangent of the difference between two angles based on their tangents.
target.name: calculate_tan_difference

target.description: Calculate the angle using the Law of Cosines given the lengths of the sides.
target.name: calculate_angle

target.code:
from sympy import Rational

def compute_tan_difference(tan_alpha, tan_beta):
    numerator = tan_alpha - tan_beta
    denominator = 1 + (tan_alpha * tan_beta)
    result = Rational(numerator, denominator)
    return result
target.description: Calculate the tangent of the difference between two angles based on their tangents.
target.name: compute_tan_difference
